name: x402jobs
description: x402jobs is a platform for creating, running, and monetizing structured automated workflows as pay-per-use APIs using the x402 payment standard. The project allows developers to bundle one or more programmable steps—such as data collection, content generation, analysis, or on-chain interactions—into a single executable “job.” Each job can be triggered manually, on a schedule, via webhook, or by another agent or application. Every execution includes a fixed platform fee and optional pricing set by the job creator. The core purpose of x402jobs is to provide a practical marketplace where software agents and humans can invoke reliable, repeatable automation without subscriptions, long-term contracts, or trust assumptions. Jobs are registered as x402 resources, making them discoverable, composable, and payable using standardized, machine-readable payment rails.
